title: Bug 11280 [View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When opening the CVS repository view in the Java perspective, double-clicking the title bar should maximize it. However, when switching to the resource perspective and then back to the Java perspective, the view loses its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should retain its maximized state when switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.
2. Double-click the title bar to maximize it.
3. Switch to the resource perspective.
4. Switch back to the Java perspective.
